1.0.name: wordpress/onelogin
1.0.description:
Provide one click single sign-on login and automatic registration support for your user's Facebook account. OneLogin is a decentralized framework that comes with support for Facebook. Any oAuth service provider could be used with minimal effort.

OneLogin provides a system for third-party plugins and theme functions to request additional permissions or use any Facebook feature.

Unlike other social login plugins all processing is done on your site.
